suite.name: Amazon Test

test.name: Test Case 2 - Product search

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome de produto "Do átomo ao buraco negro" no campo de pesquisa
kw.source_name: Digitar o nome de produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo de pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Do átomo ao buraco negro' into text field '//div[contains(@class,'field')]/*[@type="text"]'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: O sistema deve exibir a tela com o resultado da pesquisa "Do átomo ao buraco negro" listando o produto
kw.source_name: O sistema deve exibir a tela com o resultado da pesquisa ${PRODUTO} listando o produto

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: The element '//div[@id="search"]/*[contains(text(), '"Do átomo ao buraco negro"')]' should be visible, but it is not.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
kw.status: The element '//div[@id="search"]/*[contains(text(), '"Do átomo ao buraco negro"')]' should be visible, but it is not.
The element '//div[@id="search"]/*[contains(text(), '"Do átomo ao buraco negro"')]' should be visible, but it is not.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.doc: Validar resultado da pesquisa por produto específico
test.status: The element '//div[@id="search"]/*[contains(text(), '"Do átomo ao buraco negro"')]' should be visible, but it is not.

suite.doc: Essa suite testa o site da Amazon.com.br
